revised_title: Heats of Formation of Free CN and Free CH2, and the Relationship between D(CO), D(CN), and D(N2)
tldr: The authors analyze the heat of formation of free CN and free CH2 radicals, and the relationship between D(CO), D(CN), and D(N2). They calculate the heat of formation of CN using three different methods, including absorption spectra and extrapolation of vibrational levels. The study provides a more accurate estimation of the heat of formation of CN, which is essential for understanding the dissociation energies of CO and N2.
